author: macfarla
content:
besu has [changed](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/8567) to fail early if system contract addresses are not present. hive genesis has already been updated (thanks <@761154847432769577>), here are some PRs to update genesis files in eth-clients

https://github.com/eth-clients/sepolia/pull/103
https://github.com/eth-clients/hoodi/pull/15
https://github.com/eth-clients/mainnet/pull/6

This will also affect ephemery - <@808969530608451584>  are you able to add these addresses to the ephemery genesis file there?

author: barnabasbusa
content: For completeness sake, could you also please open a pr for holesky?
